Luke Ho, Money Maverick at Money MaverickLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 08 Apr 2019Where are you basing your probability off?It was highly improbable for the market to crash in 2008 based on worldwide news.It was highly improbable for the market to do well in 2017 based on worldwide news.0 comments0
